trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around December 31st 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a summer night and I wasn't doing anything at the time. I was just sitting down in the dark trying to cool off. I looked at the time, the time was approximately 12:00am. I was about to go to sleep on the couch. As soon as i went to lie down I saw two bright lights. I ignored it for a few minutes just realizing the lights were not normal. The lights in the sky were the same size as the sun. No airplane or helicopter could have a bright light like what I witnessed. It looked like a massive star continuously glowing. The colours of the bright lights were yellow when i was looking at it. I felt happy and calm and my eyes wanted to blink but I was amazed so much. All thoughts in my head eventually went away. When the two UFO's turned towards the city the shape was a silhouette of half a circle. Then they were traveling faster than any object I saw in my life. I just lost sight of them when were heading towards the city. (I'm sorry if i don't have a recording, i was just more amazed with the UFO more than my mobile phone)
Summary: Two UFO's witnessed at night near Melbourne city
